items.content_html: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.
items.title: arbasirian/tabulify: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.

items.content_html: A Firefox extension that allows users to download PDFs from StudyDrive without restrictions or premium subscriptions, provided they are logged into their account. This lightweight and efficient tool ensures quick access to educational resources.
items.title: jaylann/StudyDriveBypass: A Firefox extension that allows users to download PDFs from StudyDrive without restrictions or premium subscriptions, provided they are logged into their account. This lightweight and efficient tool ensures quick access to educational resources.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
